title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and pull models via Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; use any LangChain abstraction with locally hosted models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user) that works via the REST API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, pull, delete, and list models with fluent builder APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; chat, stream, and manage local models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair-programmer.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack by deepset integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes: function-calling, JSON mode, RAG, fine-tuning, and more with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI, and RAG extras for quick local playgrounds.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama service; decorators for chat, stream, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; strongly typed requests/responses with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting chat, completion, and embeddings with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama; upload PDFs for RAG and switch models on the fly.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama chat and embeddings APIs with admin UI and REST serializers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in threads; supports slash commands and custom system prompts per guild.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for DM and channel chat with optional RAG via uploaded files.
